activities: Pazien, Inc. aggregates and analyzes payments related data on behalf of merchants.  Personal data (name, address, email, phone numbers, account information) is sometimes received as part of payment transaction data and is used to help client businesses manage their payment processing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client, and customer personal data processed through automated means
privacyprograms: self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: EU and Swiss data protection authorities.
